Title: Authorizes institutional dispensers to dispense controlled substances for use off premises in an emergency situation
Summary: Authorizes institutional dispensers to dispense controlled substances for use off its premises in an emergency situation for a period not to exceed twenty-four hours unless a longer time period has been authorized.
LawCode: Amd §§3342, 3350 & 3351, Art 33 Title 5 Title Head, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to authorizing institutional dispensers to dispense controlled substances for use off premises in an emergency situation
